item.description:
Join us for Hibachi! A new sushi bar and hibachi grill at the heart of Vernon, Top Fuji offers dinner theater, creative maki rolls, and a Japanese steakhouse menu. For a real taste of Tokyo, sit at booths in the back room that are set into a raised floor, giving the impression you are dining in authentic fashion. BYOB.

We will be sitting at a Hibachi table which seats 9 people. If more people would like to join we are able to start another table no trouble. If anyone is willing to help with this meetup feel free to contact me. Hope to see you there!

Megan!
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under the name "Meetup Megan" I will be there by 6:15PM to start taking attendance, please be on time!

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Let's do Hibachi!
